name: openclaw-router
description: Smart multi-provider LLM router for OpenClaw. Save 78% on inference costs with 30+ models and support for multiple providers (OpenRouter, NVIDIA, etc.).

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.test:quick: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:resilience:quick
scripts.test:all: npm run test:quick && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:resilience:full
scripts.test:integration: npx tsx test/fallback.ts && npx tsx test/google-messages.ts
scripts.test:resilience:quick: npm run test:resilience:errors && npm run test:resilience:lifecycle
scripts.test:resilience:full: npm run test:resilience:errors && npm run test:resilience:lifecycle && npm run test:resilience:stability:full

author: OpenClaw Router Community
